p: Women rated the VHC2 sample with highest score for taste (4.83 points), followed by flavor and taste attributes with the same score 4.67 ( Figure 5b). The VHC1 chocolate sample was less appreciated by women, compared to the HCV2 sample obtaining for the taste and color attributes 4.17 and 3.83 respectively. The lowest scores were given to the consistency and flavors obtaining 3.67 points each ( Figure 5b).
